The _settings.ini_ located in %APPDATA%\PimpBot allows modifying some of application's behaviour.

==Settings==
*PimpDir*
<br>location for project files (.pimp)
<br>must be a path to any writable folder

*AVSDir*
<br>location of the AVS folder, required for detection of resource files

*Tag*
<br>default tag-file for your installer
<br>e.g. _C:\full\path\to\mytag.diz_

*Update*
<br>enable/disable update checker
<br>possible values: 0 | 1

*Cheats*
<br>enable/disable website autocompletion
<br>possible values: 0 | 1

*AeroStyle*
<br>enables Aero style for installers
<br>possible values: 0 | 1

*RunOnWin9x*
<br>hides OS warning on launch (PimpBot 4.4.1 and later)
<br>possible values: 0 | 1

*TempDir*
<br>allows using an alternative temporary folder (PimpBot 4.3 and later)
<br>must be a path to any writable folder

*AutoClose*
<br>close after backup completion
<br>possible values: 0 | 1

~~*Terminator*
<br>countdown in seconds before termination~~
